participant_1.background:
I am clumsy, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things.
I went to a music festival with my family and we all had a great time.
I play the bass guitar because it is a good instrument for someone who is well built and tall.
I work long hours in the sun and my eyes get tired.
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.

participant_2.background:
I like to fantasize about my pets being able to talk to me and tell me all of their secrets.
I enjoy the flexibility of my work schedule so I can spend time with my family and dog.
i could move out , but she doesn t want me to.
I make sure to keep up with my family by spending quality time with them outdoors.
I wish my spouse could work less so we could spend more time together.

content.text: Yes, I have a dog and a cat. I love them both very much!
A golden retriever. She's a sweetheart.
I love golden retrievers. I want to get one someday.
I know, I've heard. Do you have any other pets?
Just a cat. He's a bit of a troublemaker, but I love him too.
I like cats too. They're so independent.
They are. But they can be affectionate too.
Do you ever wish your pets could talk?
All the time! I would love to know what they're thinking.
Me too! I'd love to know what my dog is thinking when she's staring at me.
I know, right? It's so hard to tell.
I wonder what they're saying about us when we're not around.
